name: ai-effort-regulation
description: AI effort regulation demo with Ollama

scripts.check-build: npm run build && echo 'âœ… Build successful!'
scripts.test: npm run build && node dist/test/run-tests.js all
scripts.test:simple: npm run build && node dist/test/run-tests.js simple
scripts.test:brainstorm: npm run build && node dist/test/run-tests.js brainstorm
scripts.test:snooze: npm run build && node dist/test/run-tests.js snooze
scripts.test:priorities: npm run build && node dist/test/run-tests.js priorities
